meanings.sent1: Her behavioral patterns were easy to observe.
meanings.sent2: The teacher praised the student for his good behavioral choices.
meanings.sent3: The cat's behavioral quirks always made the family laugh.
meanings.sent4: The behavioral changes in the weather signaled the start of spring.
meanings.sent5: The behavioral training session left a lasting impact on the dog.

meanings.definition: The way in which an animal or person acts or conducts themselves, especially in a particular situation.
meanings.sent1: Observing the behavioral of the monkeys was fascinating.
meanings.sent2: His behavioral at the party was polite and friendly.
meanings.sent3: The behavioral of the penguins at feeding time was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The behavioral of the market mirrored that of a rollercoaster.
meanings.sent5: The behavioral of the children in the playground was full of energy and joy.
